3089.name: Rabadon's Deathcap
3089.description:
+120 Ability Power

UNIQUE Passive: Increases Ability Power by 30%.
3089.sanitizedDescription: +120 Ability Power UNIQUE Passive: Increases Ability Power by 30%.

3157.name: Zhonya's Hourglass
3157.description:
+120 Ability Power
+50 Armor

UNIQUE Active - Stasis: Champion becomes invulnerable and untargetable for 2.5 seconds, but is unable to move, attack, cast spells, or use items during this time (90 second cooldown).
3157.sanitizedDescription: +120 Ability Power +50 Armor UNIQUE Active - Stasis: Champion becomes invulnerable and untargetable for 2.5 seconds, but is unable to move, attack, cast spells, or use items during this time (90 second cooldown).
3157.plaintext: Activate to become invincible but unable to take actions

3285.name: Luden's Echo
3285.description:
+100 Ability Power
+10% Movement Speed

UNIQUE Passive: Gain charges upon moving or casting. At 100 charges, the next spell hit expends all charges to deal 100 (+10% AP) bonus magic damage to up to 4 targets on hit.
3285.sanitizedDescription: +100 Ability Power +10% Movement Speed UNIQUE Passive: Gain charges upon moving or casting. At 100 charges, the next spell hit expends all charges to deal 100 (+10% AP) bonus magic damage to up to 4 targets on hit.
3285.plaintext: Increases Ability Power and Movement Speed

3116.name: Rylai's Crystal Scepter
3116.description:
+400 Health
+100 Ability Power

UNIQUE Passive: Damaging spells and abilities apply a Movement Speed reduction to enemies based on the spell type:

Single Target: 40% reduction for 1.5 seconds.
Area of Effect: 40% reduction for 1 seconds
Damage over Time or Multi-hit: 20% reduction for 1 seconds.
Summoned Minions: 20% reduction for 1 seconds.

(If a spell fits in more than one category, it uses the weakest slow value.)
3116.sanitizedDescription: +400 Health +100 Ability Power UNIQUE Passive: Damaging spells and abilities apply a Movement Speed reduction to enemies based on the spell type: Single Target: 40% reduction for 1.5 seconds. Area of Effect: 40% reduction for 1 seconds Damage over Time or Multi-hit: 20% reduction for 1 seconds. Summoned Minions: 20% reduction for 1 seconds. (If a spell fits in more than one category, it uses the weakest slow value.)

3003.name: Archangel's Staff
3003.description:
+80 Ability Power
+250 Mana
+50% Base Mana Regen

UNIQUE Passive - Insight: Grants Ability Power equal to 3% of maximum Mana.
UNIQUE Passive - Mana Charge: Grants +8 maximum Mana (max +750 Mana) for each spell cast and Mana expenditure (occurs up to 2 times every 8 seconds). Transforms into Seraph's Embrace at +750 Mana.

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
3003.sanitizedDescription: +80 Ability Power +250 Mana +50% Base Mana Regen UNIQUE Passive - Insight: Grants Ability Power equal to 3% of maximum Mana. UNIQUE Passive - Mana Charge: Grants +8 maximum Mana (max +750 Mana) for each spell cast and Mana expenditure (occurs up to 2 times every 8 seconds). Transforms into Seraph's Embrace at +750 Mana. (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
3003.plaintext: Increases Ability Power based on maximum Mana

3048.name: Seraph's Embrace
3048.description:
+80 Ability Power
+1000 Mana
+50% Base Mana Regen

UNIQUE Passive - Insight: Grants Ability Power equal to 3% of maximum Mana.
UNIQUE Active - Mana Shield: Consumes 20% of current Mana to grant a shield for 3 seconds that absorbs damage equal to 150 plus the amount of Mana consumed (120 second cooldown).

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
3048.sanitizedDescription: +80 Ability Power +1000 Mana +50% Base Mana Regen UNIQUE Passive - Insight: Grants Ability Power equal to 3% of maximum Mana. UNIQUE Active - Mana Shield: Consumes 20% of current Mana to grant a shield for 3 seconds that absorbs damage equal to 150 plus the amount of Mana consumed (120 second cooldown). (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

3027.name: Rod of Ages
3027.description:
+450 Health
+450 Mana
+60 Ability Power

Passive: Grants +20 Health, +20 Mana, and +2 Ability Power per stack (max +200 Health, +200 Mana, and +20 Ability Power). Grants 1 stack per minute (max 10 stacks).
UNIQUE Passive - Valor's Reward: Upon leveling up, restores 150 Health and 200 Mana over 8 seconds.

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
3027.sanitizedDescription: +450 Health +450 Mana +60 Ability Power Passive: Grants +20 Health, +20 Mana, and +2 Ability Power per stack (max +200 Health, +200 Mana, and +20 Ability Power). Grants 1 stack per minute (max 10 stacks). UNIQUE Passive - Valor's Reward: Upon leveling up, restores 150 Health and 200 Mana over 8 seconds. (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
3027.plaintext: Greatly increases Health, Mana, and Ability Power

3136.name: Haunting Guise
3136.description:
+25 Ability Power
+200 Health

UNIQUE Passive - Eyes of Pain: +15 Magic Penetration

(Magic Penetration: Magic damage is increased by ignoring an amount of the target's Magic Resist equal to Magic Penetration.)

(Unique Passives with the same name do not stack.)
3136.sanitizedDescription: +25 Ability Power +200 Health UNIQUE Passive - Eyes of Pain: +15 Magic Penetration (Magic Penetration: Magic damage is increased by ignoring an amount of the target's Magic Resist equal to Magic Penetration.) (Unique Passives with the same name do not stack.)

3151.name: Liandry's Torment
3151.description:
+80 Ability Power
+300 Health

UNIQUE Passive - Eyes of Pain: +15 Magic Penetration
UNIQUE Passive: Dealing spell damage applies a damage-over-time effect for 3 seconds that deals bonus magic damage equal to 2% of the target's current Health per second. This bonus damage is doubled against movement-impaired units and capped at 100 damage per second vs. monsters.

(A unit is movement-impaired if it is slowed, stunned, taunted, feared, or immobilized.)

(Magic Penetration: Magic damage is increased by ignoring an amount of the target's Magic Resist equal to Magic Penetration.)

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
3151.sanitizedDescription: +80 Ability Power +300 Health UNIQUE Passive - Eyes of Pain: +15 Magic Penetration UNIQUE Passive: Dealing spell damage applies a damage-over-time effect for 3 seconds that deals bonus magic damage equal to 2% of the target's current Health per second. This bonus damage is doubled against movement-impaired units and capped at 100 damage per second vs. monsters. (A unit is movement-impaired if it is slowed, stunned, taunted, feared, or immobilized.) (Magic Penetration: Magic damage is increased by ignoring an amount of the target's Magic Resist equal to Magic Penetration.) (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
3151.plaintext: Spell damage burns enemies for a portion of their Health

3135.name: Void Staff
3135.description:
+80 Ability Power

UNIQUE Passive: Magic damage ignores 35% of the target's Magic Resist (applies before Magic Penetration).
3135.sanitizedDescription: +80 Ability Power UNIQUE Passive: Magic damage ignores 35% of the target's Magic Resist (applies before Magic Penetration).

3136.name: Haunting Guise
3136.description:
+25 Ability Power
+200 Health

UNIQUE Passive - Eyes of Pain: +15 Magic Penetration

(Magic Penetration: Magic damage is increased by ignoring an amount of the target's Magic Resist equal to Magic Penetration.)

(Unique Passives with the same name do not stack.)
3136.sanitizedDescription: +25 Ability Power +200 Health UNIQUE Passive - Eyes of Pain: +15 Magic Penetration (Magic Penetration: Magic damage is increased by ignoring an amount of the target's Magic Resist equal to Magic Penetration.) (Unique Passives with the same name do not stack.)

3115.name: Nashor's Tooth
3115.description:
+40% Attack Speed
+80 Ability Power

UNIQUE Passive: +20% Cooldown Reduction
UNIQUE Passive: Basic attacks deal 15 (+15% of Ability Power) bonus magic damage on hit.
3115.sanitizedDescription: +40% Attack Speed +80 Ability Power UNIQUE Passive: +20% Cooldown Reduction UNIQUE Passive: Basic attacks deal 15 (+15% of Ability Power) bonus magic damage on hit.
3115.plaintext: Increases Attack Speed, Ability Power, and Cooldown Reduction

3152.name: Will of the Ancients
3152.description:
+80 Ability Power
+10% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE Passive: Your spells and abilities heal you for 15% of the damage dealt, calculated before your target's resistances. This effect is reduced to one third for AoE effects.
3152.sanitizedDescription: +80 Ability Power +10% Cooldown Reduction UNIQUE Passive: Your spells and abilities heal you for 15% of the damage dealt, calculated before your target's resistances. This effect is reduced to one third for AoE effects.
3152.plaintext: Grants Spell Vamp and Ability Power

3165.name: Morellonomicon
3165.description:
+80 Ability Power
+20% Cooldown Reduction
+100% Base Mana Regen

UNIQUE Passive: Dealing magic damage to enemy champions below 40% Health inflicts Grievous Wounds for 4 seconds.

(Grievous Wounds reduces incoming healing and regeneration effects by 50%.)
3165.sanitizedDescription: +80 Ability Power +20% Cooldown Reduction +100% Base Mana Regen UNIQUE Passive: Dealing magic damage to enemy champions below 40% Health inflicts Grievous Wounds for 4 seconds. (Grievous Wounds reduces incoming healing and regeneration effects by 50%.)
3165.plaintext: Greatly increases Ability Power and Cooldown Reduction

3174.name: Athene's Unholy Grail
3174.description:
+60 Ability Power
+25 Magic Resist
+20% Cooldown Reduction
+100% Base Mana Regen

UNIQUE Passive: Restores 30% of maximum Mana on kill or assist.
UNIQUE Passive - Mana Font: Restores 2% of missing Mana every 5 seconds.

(Unique Passives with the same name do not stack.)
3174.sanitizedDescription: +60 Ability Power +25 Magic Resist +20% Cooldown Reduction +100% Base Mana Regen UNIQUE Passive: Restores 30% of maximum Mana on kill or assist. UNIQUE Passive - Mana Font: Restores 2% of missing Mana every 5 seconds. (Unique Passives with the same name do not stack.)
3174.plaintext: Restores maximum Mana on kill or assist
